caption.p: Antioxidant activity of the LEP extract. Values represent the percent of 2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH) remaining after 15, 30 and 45 min. **** Values are significantly different at p < 0.0001, according to a two-way ANOVA combined with Tukey’s post-hoc test. Data are expressed as the mean of three replicates ± SD.
